metadata.title: CVE-2018-12437 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
LibTomCrypt through 1.18.1 allows a memory-cache side-channel attack onECDSA signatures, aka the Return Of the Hidden Number Problem or ROHNP. Todiscover an ECDSA key, the attacker needs access to either the localmachine or a different virtual machine on the same physical host.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12437` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtomcrypt1 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtomcrypt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1').
